title: Worker Docs Infrastructure
description:
Create a Hono worker with integrated documentation, APIs, and RPC endpoints using Workers Static Assets for zero-cost static serving.

## Architecture
```
worker/        # Hono (dynamic: /api/*, /mcp, /rpc/*)
app/           # TanStack Start (static: /, /docs/*, /admin/*)
docs/          # MDX content source (hand-written guides, concepts)
```

## Routes
| Route | Type | Stack | Cost |
|-------|------|-------|------|
| `/` | Static | TanStack + beacon | $0 |
| `/docs/*` | Static | TanStack + Fumadocs + shadcn | $0 |
| `/admin/*` | Static | TanStack + cockpit + shadcn | $0 |
| `/api/*` | Dynamic | Hono REST API | Compute |
| `/mcp` | Dynamic | Hono + MCP SDK | Compute |
| `/rpc/*` | Dynamic | Hono + capnweb | Compute |

## Content Strategy
- **docs/** = Hand-written content (guides, concepts, tutorials)
- **Auto-generated** = API/CLI/MCP/RPC/SDK reference docs from DO definitions (TBD)

## Stack
- **Static**: TanStack Start + Fumadocs + shadcn/ui → Workers Static Assets
- **Dynamic**: Hono + MCP SDK + capnweb
- **Deployment**: Cloudflare Workers with Static Assets binding
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Static routes (/, /docs/*, /admin/*) served from CDN without worker invocation
- [ ] Dynamic routes (/api/*, /mcp, /rpc/*) handled by Hono worker
- [ ] Fumadocs renders MDX documentation with search
- [ ] shadcn/ui components work in TanStack Start
- [ ] MCP server handles sessions via Streamable HTTP
- [ ] capnweb RPC supports HTTP batch + WebSocket
- [ ] All tests pass (unit, integration, e2e)
- [ ] Deploys to Cloudflare Workers

title: Auto-generate API/CLI/MCP/RPC/SDK docs from DO definitions
description:
Design and implement a system to automatically generate reference documentation from Durable Object definitions.

## Structure
```
docs/
├── getting-started/   # Hand-written
├── concepts/          # Hand-written
├── guides/            # Hand-written
├── api/               # Auto-generated (root: true) - REST endpoints
├── cli/               # Auto-generated (root: true) - CLI commands
├── mcp/               # Auto-generated (root: true) - MCP tools/resources
├── rpc/               # RPC.do reference (root: true) - includes concepts + auto-generated methods
└── sdk/               # Auto-generated (root: true) - TypeScript types
```

Each auto-generated folder has `"root": true` in meta.json for sidebar dropdown segmentation.

## RPC.do Docs (Special)
Hand-written conceptual docs + auto-generated method reference:
- **proxy-chaining** - Chain method calls without awaiting
- **pipelines** - Batch operations into single round-trips
- **magic-map** - Transform collections server-side
- **await-patterns** - When to await vs when to pipeline

## Generation Sources
- **docs/api/** - Extract from Hono route definitions, generate OpenAPI spec
- **docs/cli/** - Extract from CLI command definitions
- **docs/mcp/** - Extract from MCP server tool/resource registrations
- **docs/rpc/** - Extract from RPC.do RpcTarget class methods
- **docs/sdk/** - Extract from TypeScript type definitions

## Approach (TBD)
- Build-time generation via Vite plugin or prebuild script
- TypeScript AST parsing for type extraction
- Hono route introspection for API docs
- Output MDX files that Fumadocs consumes
